title: 2007 USC Trojans football team
summary: The 2007 USC Trojans football team (variously "Trojans" or "USC") represented the University of Southern California during the 2007 NCAA Division I FBS football season, winning a share of the Pacific-10 Conference (Pac-10) championship and winning the 2008Â Rose Bowl.[1]  The team was coached by Pete Carroll and played its home games at the Los Angeles Coliseum.
